alert.note: Alert for Bandera (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:56PM CDT until June 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MEDINA AND SOUTHEASTERN BANDERA COUNTIES... At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Lakehills, or 9 miles south of Bandera, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lakehills, Hill Country State Natural Area and Lake Medina Shores. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
